```{r}
parameters = list(beta = 5.7,
                  sigma = 0.125, gamma = 0.2,
                  mu = 0.00005,
                  n = 0.73)
initials = c(S = 0.05,
             E = 0.0001,
             I = 0.0001,
             R = 0.0298)
seir = SEIR(pars = parameters,init = initials, time = 0:(60*365))
PlotMods(seir)
```
